sentences.en: Haig went on to elucidate his personal principle of war.
sentences.cn: 海格继续解释他个人的战争原则。

sentences.en: He used aphid fecundity data to elucidate the theoretical effects of antibiosis on insect population dynamics.
sentences.cn: 他利用蚜虫繁殖力资料说明了抗生作用对虫口动态的理论效应.

sentences.en: He would go the extra mile to try to elucidate his intentions.
sentences.cn: 他会不惜一切尝试阐明他的意向.

sentences.en: It is of profound interest to elucidate the enzymatic activities in soil.
sentences.cn: 阐明土壤中酶的活性是有深远意义的.

sentences.en: Objective: To elucidate the diagnosis and differential diagnosis of ovarian Brenner tumors.
sentences.cn: 目的: 观察和分析卵巢勃勒纳(Brenner) 瘤的临床和病理形态学特点,并阐明其诊断和鉴别诊断要点.

sentences.en: On the basis of my own observations, I should like to elucidate a few problems concerning the Soviet Union and China.
sentences.cn: 我想根据我的观察, 说明几个和苏联和中国都有关系的问题.

sentences.en: Perhaps it is something that JKR will elucidate in time.
sentences.cn: 不过那就是另一篇文章的题材了.

sentences.en: Please elucidate the reasons for your decision.
sentences.cn: 请把你作出决定的理由解释清楚.

sentences.en: Posner's purpose is to elucidate wealth maximization's superiority over utilitarianism.
sentences.cn: 他竭力论证财富最大化是一种和功利主义不同的、更好的规范理论.

sentences.en: The full picture has not yet been elucidated.
sentences.cn: 详细情况还没有解释清楚。

sentences.en: The note help to elucidate the most difficult parts of the text.
sentences.cn: 这些注释有助于弄清文中最难懂的部分.

sentences.en: The object is to addle and not to elucidate.
sentences.cn: 其目的是为了混淆而不是为了阐明.

sentences.en: There was no need for him to elucidate.
This guide will elucidate these differences and how to exploit them.
sentences.cn: 这篇指导将会阐述这些不同点以及如何正确利用它们.

sentences.en: We asked Miss Maudie to elucidate.
sentences.cn: 我们请莫迪小姐说清楚点.

sentences.en: You have not understood; allow me to elucidate.
sentences.cn: 你没理解, 让我解释一下.

trans.tran_en: to explain something that is difficult to understand by providing more information
to explain something that is difficult to understand by providing more information
